name: Elsword Forums - Dark Theme
description: Dark theme for the Elsword forums. Based on the background.
additional_info:
9/1/2017 - Changed image host, fixed BG of the "post on new page"-thing, fixed the "latest activity" tab, and adjusted PM chat emoji background.

9/7/2017 - Slight tweaks: moved online/offline status to bottom-right of avatar, adjusted size of the no-character avatar, changed some colors.

9/13/2017 - Since Harmony Festival changed the bg, I changed it back to the original one.

9/27/2017 - Fixed table colors.

10/12/2017 - Removed bg from text box.

2/4/2017 - Made first 9 lines of the CSS give you the option to keep the original black/blue forum bg or stick with whatever KOG has at the moment. Also updated color of the announcement box.
